To everyone having "Softlock" issues -- where AutoCAD shuts down before coming up, and gives you a "The security system (softlock license manager) is not functioning..." message:

1.You must delete the license lock files (C:\ProgramData\FLEXNet\*.*)
2.Restart AutoCAD
3.Start Keygen program
4.Hit Mem Patch
5.Continue to the Product License Activation Options screen and grab request code
6.Place into Keygen, Generate and activate
